info.description:
EXAMPLE CODE ONLY
This Example Code is only intended for illustrating an example of a possible BSW integration and BSW configuration. The Example Code has not passed any quality control measures and may be incomplete. The Example Code is neither intended nor qualified for use in series production. The Example Code as well as any of its modifications and/or implementations must be tested with diligent care and must comply with all quality requirements which are necessary according to the state of the art before their use.

statechange.title: Activate COM Tx Only Use Case

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application
Wait for rx data processing on ECU side.

set.title: Set sensor value to 254, this will be scaled to the maximum value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal

set.title: Set sensor value to 128, this will be scaled to the median value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal

set.title: Set sensor value to 0, this will be scaled to the minimum value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal

set.title: Switch back to Com Rx/Tx use case

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application
Wait for rx data processing on ECU side.

set.title: Set sensor value to 254, this will be scaled to the maximum value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal

set.title: Set sensor value to 128, this will be scaled to the median value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal

set.title: Set sensor value to 0, this will be scaled to the minimum value of the Rx signal

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is a difference between actual and expected output because the Rx signal has been transmitted on the bus but the ECU has not updated the Tx signal yet.
Wait until there is no difference between actual and expected output because the ECU has updated the Tx signal
Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application

wait.title: Wait to allow System Variables to change

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is no diagnostic request active and no further requests are queued.

statechange.title: Try to activate default session via DSC

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that a response can be received: either positive response (0x50) or negative response (0x7F)
Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application

wait.title: Wait to allow System Variables to change

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is no diagnostic request active and no further requests are queued.

statechange.title: Initialize: Reset DID value to 0 via RxData

wait.title: Wait to allow for transmission of control signals

statechange.title: Get DID value via RDBI and verify that it was reset to 0x0000
Set event status to passed to increment the DID value by 1
Get DID value via RDBI and verify that it was set to 0x0001

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application

wait.title: Wait to allow System Variables to change

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is no diagnostic request active and no further requests are queued.

statechange.title: Initialize: Reset DID value to 0 via RxData

wait.title: Wait to allow for transmission of control signals

awaitvaluematch.title: Get DID value via TxData and verify that it was reset to 0x0000

statechange.title: Set DID value to 0x0005 via WDBI

awaitvaluematch.title: Get DID value via TxData and verify that it was set to 0x0005
Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application

wait.title: Wait to allow System Variables to change

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait until there is no diagnostic request active and no further requests are queued.

statechange.title: Initialize: Reset event counter to 0 via RxData

wait.title: Wait to allow for transmission of control signals

statechange.title: Get DTC snapshot and verify that no snapshot record is returned (i.e. -1)
Get DTC snapshot and verify that still no snapshot record is returned (i.e. -1)
Get DTC snapshot and verify that a snapshot record with the value 2 is returned
Get DTC snapshot and verify that still a snapshot record with the value 2 is returned
Get DTC snapshot and verify that still a snapshot record with the value 2 is returned
Get DTC snapshot and verify that no snapshot record is returned (i.e. -1)
Get DTC snapshot and verify that a snapshot record with the value 5 is returned

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode

statechange.title: Request NoCom for Tester and ECU

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait for transition into bus sleep mode
Verify that the test application request FullCom for all ComM users
Check appearance of NM messages from ECU

statechange.title: Request FullCom for Tester and ECU

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel
Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode

statechange.title: Request NoCom for Tester and ECU

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait for transition into bus sleep mode
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode

statecheck.title: Evaluate appearance of ECU timer based network requests.

statechange.title: Request FullCom for Tester and ECU

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel
Verify that the current CANoe version is suitable for the Start Application
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode

statechange.title: Request NoCom for ECU and FullCom for Tester

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that ECU stops the transmission of Nm messages

statechange.title: Reset ECU timer/user network request counter

wait.title: Wait before evaluation of ECU timer/user network request state

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode and the ECU did not request the network

statechange.title: Request FullCom for Tester and ECU

awaitvaluematch.title: Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode
Wait for transition into bus sleep mode
Verify that the test application request FullCom for all ComM users
Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode
Wait for transition into bus sleep mode
Verify that the test application request FullCom for all ComM users
Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel
Verify that the channel is in FullCom mode
Wait for transition into bus sleep mode
Verify that the test application request FullCom for all ComM users
Check appearance of NM messages from ECU
Wait up to 10s for FullCom on channel

set.title: Set sensor value to 48, triggers writing of IRV from a valid context

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the read IRV value is equal to the written value and no memory access violation occurred

set.title: Set sensor value to 32, triggers writing of IRV from a valid context

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the read IRV value is equal to the written value and no memory access violation occurred

set.title: Set memory access mode to an invalid context
Set sensor value to 16, triggers writing of IRV from an invalid context

awaitvaluematch.title: Verify that the IRV value does not change and a memory access violation was detected

testcaseinstance.title: CAN Data Transmission ( CAN_Backbone2 )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the application can transmit data on CAN using signals or signal groups. Ecu Rx signal: 'EngineGasRate_oEMS_BB2_05P_oBackbone2_96ec243f_Rx', Ecu Tx signal: 'PinCode_validity_time_oCIOM_BB2_10P_oBackbone2_d8b8c81c_Tx'.

testcaseinstance.title: CAN Data Reception ( CAN_Backbone2 )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the application can receive data on CAN using signals or signal groups. Ecu Rx signal: 'EngineGasRate_oEMS_BB2_05P_oBackbone2_96ec243f_Rx', Ecu Tx signal: 'PinCode_validity_time_oCIOM_BB2_10P_oBackbone2_d8b8c81c_Tx'.

testcaseinstance.title: LIN Data Transmission ( LIN1_CIOM )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the application can transmit data on LIN using signals. Ecu Rx signal: 'EngineGasRate_oEMS_BB2_05P_oBackbone2_96ec243f_Rx', Ecu Tx signal: 'FSP1IndicationCmdL1_oFSP_1_2_Req_L1_oLIN00_c2c0fe90_Tx'.

testcaseinstance.title: LIN Data Reception ( LIN1_CIOM )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the application can receive data on LIN using signals. Ecu Rx signal: 'FSP2SwitchStatusL1_oFSP2_Frame_L1_oLIN00_ee70e556_Rx', Ecu Tx signal: 'FSP1IndicationCmdL1_oFSP_1_2_Req_L1_oLIN00_c2c0fe90_Tx'.

testcaseinstance.title: Basic Request/Response via UDS over CAN ( CAN_Backbone2 )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that a DCM request can be sent and a response can be received via UDS over CAN

testcaseinstance.title: Internal Wakeup on CAN with Autosar NM ( CAN_Backbone2 )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the application can trigger the transition from Bus Sleep to Normal Operation on CAN

testcaseinstance.title: NM Vote Reception on CAN with Autosar NM ( CAN_Backbone2 )
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the DUT keeps the CAN channel awake as long as it receives NM messages.

testcaseinstance.title: Memory Access Violation Detection
testcaseinstance.paramvalue: Verify that the MPU detects a memory access violation and the OS protection hook is called.
